column3:
Change is OK,

Ideally, we should put the default values outside the translation message, so that we can change those without triggering retranslation.

I would like us to do your suggestion for the >0.7 release, as it makes senes, but would be bad translation wise in the current phase. That one is just a quick fix, while I was browsing that part of the code :).

Edit: As we found out the idea to separate the default values from the translations takes to much time, this is now just a small fix.
